txt.en: Gyric is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Gyric with news of your success.
'You should speak with Wulfherr when you arrive in Scylfig.'
'You have done well, [placeholder]...a perfect score in so short a time. You should return to Gyric now with my recommendation.'

'The people of Wildermore have much to be thankful for, [placeholder], despite the destruction wrought by the giant Núrzum. The folk of Scylfig celebrate by holding a small festival outside their town.

'You should go there at once and join the festivities. I hear that they are holding a demonstration of mounted archery in the form of a race. Whether you are skilled or not, you should try your hand at it.

'A friend of mine, Wulfherr, is overseeing the festivities. He will be able to provide you with everything you need. Let me know when you are ready to go to Scylfig, and I will arrange your travel.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires Mounted Combat</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>Note: This quest auto-completes upon beating the course.</rgb>

'So, Gyric sent you? Indeed, we do have much to be thankful for. While the giant wrought terrible damage upon our village, he is dead and we are alive. That is all the motivation we need for celebrating.

'We are hosting a demonstration of mounted archery in the form of a race. Take this bow and mount your war-steed. Follow the targets around and up the mountain and back down to the road, shooting targets as you go. I will score your performance. Green targets will yield one point, while blue targets will earn you five. Keep an eye out for the rare red targets -- often on high ledges -- for they will yield ten points.

'If you reach one hundred points, you will earn a reward! The race is timed, so you must hurry!'

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires Mounted Combat</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>Note: This quest auto-completes upon beating the course.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Gyric is waiting for your decision in Forlaw.\n\nYou should speak with Gyric when you are ready to travel to Scylfig in the Writhendowns and talk to Wulfherr to join the festivities.

Targets may be found along the road west and north of Scylfig and up through the mountains.\n\nWulfherr has begun to count your time. You should shoot as many targets as possible before time runs out.
Use the bow Wulfherr gave you to obtain your skills.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest auto-completes upon beating the course.</rgb>
'Alas, your skills are not what they seemed at first. Perhaps Gyric will allow you another pass?'
'You should speak with Wulfherr when you arrive in Scylfig.'
Talk to Gyric to travel to Scylfig in the Writhendowns and speak with Wulfherr

Targets may be found throughout the course in the Writhendowns.

Destroy targets to gain points towards the success of the celebration event.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest auto-completes upon beating the course.</rgb>
Use the bow to obtain your skills
'Your skills still need work, I am afraid.'

The people of Scylfig celebrate the end of the giant Núrzum.

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires Mounted Combat</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>Note: This quest auto-completes upon beating the course.</rgb>
Wulfherr awaits you outside of Scylfig.\n\nYou should return to Wulfherr for evaluation.
'I have received Wulfherr's report...you are a fine [placeholder] indeed! The people of Scylfig were awed by your skills.'
